messages.message:
Hello, receiving this error when trying to build app-tasks locally - any ideas on how to fix? I've cleaned up all of my docker images already and updated `requirements.txt`

`ERROR [ 2/18] RUN apt-get update --fix-missing &&     apt-get upgrade -y &&     apt-get -y install libgl1-mesa-glx`   

`executor failed running [/bin/sh -c apt-get update --fix-missing &&     apt-get upgrade -y &&     apt-get -y install $CV2_DEPS]: exit code: 100`
you probably need to run `docker system prune`
how much memory are you giving docker? these are the settings i have
I also got an exit code 100 when building `server-nginx` but was able to resolve with `docker system prune -a` similar to Serenaâ€™s suggestion.
Hm, still getting the issue - docker settings look pretty similar to yours @Serena
how much disk image is being used? if you run `docker system prune`, does it say it pruned 0GB?
resolved - just reran all my services through the one liner and it worked
